attributes.action: More rigorous and comprehensive driving test standards.
attributes.additional_details: Demonstrate your support for more efficient and safer British roads, by signing up. Driving test standards should ensure that modules in: driving around town, all weather driving, driving in the countryside, driving at night, driving on dual carriageways and driving on motorways are all made compulsory curriculum, just as they are in other countries. Minimum hours spent practicing these modules should also be set. We should even go as far as they do on the continent, where eyesight is tested by an optician as a prerequisite to obtaining a driving license.
